name: react-livechat
description: React component to integrate LiveChat with your single-page app

scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i LiveChat/LiveChat.js -o dist/LiveChat.min.js
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i LiveChat/LiveChat.js -o dist/LiveChat.js
